messages.hero_description: Every week we drop a brand-new memory card—high-quality, interactive, and designed to put you in control. No recycled clips, no passive watching—just full immersion, photoreal models, and scenarios built to feel real from every angle.
messages.hero_title: Step into the next level of adult VR

messages.install_meta_description: Get our app directly from the Meta Quest Store. One-click installation for Quest 3, Quest 3S, and Quest Pro users.
messages.install_windows_description: Experience the highest fidelity VR with full PCVR support. Includes our standalone 2D viewer for non-VR playback on your desktop.
messages.latest_hot_releases: Hot releases and red-alert content for players who want the latest drop first.

messages.pc_system_requirements: You'll need a Windows PC with at least 8GB of RAM, a mid-range GPU (GTX 1060 or higher), and a stable internet connection.

No recycled clips, no passive watching—just full immersion, photoreal models, and scenarios built to feel real from every angle.

messages.transaction_disclaimer: Transactions will appear as 'Neurovice Ltd' on your card statement. We only use PCI DSS compliant payment providers to process purchases. We never store your credit card information.
messages.vr_game_definition: It's an interactive experience built for VR headsets that combines gameplay with immersive adult content.
messages.vr_game_vs_video: Unlike passive videos, VR games offer interactivity, freedom of movement, character choices and real-time animations.
messages.vr_headsets_support: Our standalone application is designed to operate seamlessly on the Meta Quest 3 and 3S, as well as the Pico 4 Ultra headset. For users with other headsets, such as those from Valve, HTC, or Pico, you can still enjoy our app by utilizing the PCVR mode, which allows for a smooth and immersive experience across various platforms.
messages.vr_porn_special_description: VR porn offers an unparalleled experience that combines realism with interactivity. The immersive nature of virtual reality allows viewers to engage with the content like never before.
messages.star_quote_example: I kinda envy other people who can jerk-off to me in Braindance, while I can’t. It’s just that good
messages.star_about_copy_example: VIXENP_ has made a stunning entrance into the Braindance universe, captivating fans since her debut in our instructional video. After weeks of eager requests from our dedicated braindancers, she finally joined the fold, and her two chapters cards are a breath of fresh air in our catalogue. Offering a softer and gentler approach, these releases showcase a different setup and an innovative approach to Braindance content, setting them apart from previous releases.
